filters.generators

Class SineWaveGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • filters.generators.SineWaveGenerator

  • public class SineWaveGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple sinusoidal wave generator and merger. Useful to test the signal analysis stuff
    Author:
    knoodrake

      • generate

        public static double[][] generate(double freq,
                  double fs,
                  double len,
                  double ampl,
                  double phase)
        Generates a simple sin wave
        Parameters:
        freq - Frequency in Hz
        fs - Sampling rate
        len - Length in seconds
        ampl - Amplitude (in.. something ?)
        phase - Phase (in Samples) @TODO: test it !
        Returns:
        the wave data where index 0 is X and 1 is Y

      • merge

        public static double[][] merge(double[][] a,
               double[][] b)
        Merges two waves. Waves Must have the same sampling rate and length
        Parameters:
        a - first signal
        b - second signal
        Returns:
        A signal with is the merge of the two given
        See Also:
        #generate(double, double, double, double, double)}
